hero.title: The Manufacturing Engineering Platform
hero.description: Plan, track, and optimize your manufacturing operations with Railes.

featureBlocks.title: Production Planning
featureBlocks.description: Optimize your production schedules and resource allocation.

featureBlocks.title: Quality Control
featureBlocks.description: Ensure product quality with real-time monitoring and alerts.

featuresGrid.title: Compliance
featuresGrid.subtitle: and Traceability
featuresGrid.description: Ensure adherence to regulations and transparent tracking of production processes, safeguarding quality and enabling swift issue resolution.

featuresGrid.title: Quality Management
featuresGrid.subtitle: and Control
featuresGrid.description: Prioritizes quality throughout the manufacturing process, facilitating quality standards enforcement, inspections, and real-time quality tracking.

featuresGrid.title: Customization
featuresGrid.subtitle: and Flexibility
featuresGrid.description: Customization options, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems and adaptation to diverse manufacturing processes.

featuresGrid.title: Advanced Data Analytics
featuresGrid.subtitle: and Artificial Intelligence
featuresGrid.description: Leveraging advanced data analytics and AI for learning and well-informed decision-making.
